data.comment: The big names in today's match at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium have now been confirmed.
The match has started.
In the minute 2, Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Throw-in for Yokohama FC in the half of Hiroshima.
Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
In the minute 5, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Hiroshima just outside Yokohama FC's area.
Hiroshima are coming forward and Tsukasa Morishima gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Yokohama FC have a goal kick.
In the minute 6, Ball safe as Yokohama FC is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Hiroshima in their own half.
Hiroshima's Hayao Kawabe gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 7, Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama FC goal kick.
Hiroshima's Hayao Kawabe gets in a shot on goal at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 10, Hiroshima needs to be cautious. Yokohama FC have an attacking throw-in.
Hiroshima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Yokohama FC.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Hiroshima close to the penalty box.
Yokohama FC awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yokohama FC have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
In the minute 14, Yusuke Matsuo of Yokohama FC gets in a strike, but is off target.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards Hiroshima a goal kick.
Hiroshima drive upfield and Shunki Higashi gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Yokohama FC defender.
In the minute 15, Can Hiroshima capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Yokohama FC's half?
Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
In the minute 18, Hiroshima's Shunki Higashi attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Yokohama.
Yokohama FC have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 21, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Yokohama FC's half.
Throw-in high up the field for Hiroshima in Yokohama.
Hiroshima take a 0-1 lead thanks to Tsukasa Morishima.
In the minute 22, Shunki Higashi instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick for Yokohama FC in their own half.
Goal kick for Hiroshima at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
In the minute 26, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Yokohama FC in their own half.
Hayao Kawabe (Hiroshima) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Douglas Vieira is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 30, Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Yokohama FC awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hiroshima's Douglas Vieira is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 31, Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama FC goal kick.
Can Yokohama FC get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hiroshima's half?
Throw-in for Yokohama FC in their own half.
In the minute 32, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Yokohama FC to take a throw-in in Hiroshima territory.
Throw-in for Hiroshima at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
In the minute 37, Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Goal! Hiroshima extend their lead to 0-2 through Douglas Vieira.
Great play from Toshihiro Aoyama to set up the goal.
In the minute 39, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Yokohama FC.
Yokohama FC to take a throw-in in Hiroshima territory.
Goal kick for Hiroshima at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
In the minute 41, Free kick for Yokohama FC in their own half.
Hiroshima have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 43, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a throw-in for Hiroshima, close to Yokohama FC's area.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards Hiroshima a goal kick.
Free kick Hiroshima.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Hiroshima in the half of Yokohama FC.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
In the minute 45, Can Yokohama FC get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hiroshima's half?
Hiroyuki Kimura blows to end the first-half.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Yokohama FC in their own half.
In the minute 46, Kyowaan Hoshi is on a sub for Masakazu Tashiro for Yokohama FC.
The home team have replaced Kensuke Sato with Tatsuki Seko. This is the second substitution made today by Takahiro Shimotaira.
Yokohama FC make their third substitution with Kazunari Ichimi replacing Yusuke Minagawa.
Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Yokohama FC in the half of Hiroshima.
In the minute 49, Hiroshima apply pressure and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Shunki Higashi. But the ball crashes against the crossbar!
Throw-in for Yokohama FC in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Douglas Vieira.
In the minute 51, Hiroshi Jofuku (Hiroshima) has taken off Douglas Vieira who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Ryo Nagai is the replacement.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards the home team a throw-in.
Yokohama FC's Yutaro Hakamata is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 54, In Yokohama a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Yokohama FC in their own half.
Ball safe as Hiroshima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 57, Hiroshima to take a throw-in in Yokohama FC territory.
Yokohama FC needs to be cautious. Hiroshima have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Yokohama FC in their own half.
In the minute 59, Hiroshima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yoshifumi Kashiwa is replacing Tomoya Fujii for Hiroshima at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
In the minute 62, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Yokohama FC's half.
Corner awarded to Yokohama FC.
Throw-in Yokohama FC.
In the minute 65, In Yokohama a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Yokohama FC at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
Free kick for Yokohama FC in their own half.
In the minute 70, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Hiroshima in their own half.
Can Yokohama FC capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hiroshima's half?
Yokohama FC are pushing forward but Yuki Kobayashi's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 73, It's a goal kick for the away team in Yokohama.
Takahiro Shimotaira is making the team's fourth substitution at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium with Leandro Domingues replacing Takuya Matsuura.
Hiroshi Jofuku (Hiroshima) is making a third substitution, with Rhayner replacing Yusuke Chajima.
Yokohama FC have a goal kick.
In the minute 75, The away team have replaced Tsukasa Morishima with Ezequiel. This is the fourth substitution made today by Hiroshi Jofuku.
Hiroshima have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 76, Hiroshima's Shunki Higashi misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Yokohama FC at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
Yokohama FC awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Yokohama FC in the half of Hiroshima.
Yokohama FC's Leandro Domingues gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Hiroshima defender.
Yokohama FC have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
In the minute 79, Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Throw-in for Hiroshima close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Yokohama FC in their own half.
In the minute 83, Leandro Domingues for Yokohama FC gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Yokohama.
Leandro Domingues is booked for the home team.
In the minute 84, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Yokohama FC.
Rhayner (Hiroshima) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 85, Yuki Kusano is replacing Koki Saito for the home team.
Ball safe as Hiroshima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Yokohama FC in the half of Hiroshima.
Can Hiroshima capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
In Yokohama Hiroshima attack through Shunki Higashi. The finish is off target, however.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards Yokohama FC a goal kick.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Yokohama FC in their own half.
Hiroshima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Yokohama FC at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
Can Yokohama FC get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hiroshima's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Yokohama FC in Yokohama.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a throw-in for Yokohama FC, close to Hiroshima's area.
Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama FC goal kick.
The match is over. Final score 0-2.
